categories.catLabel: aDVM_1A1C Liquified Petroleum Gas (LPG) or propane

categories.catLabel: aDVM_1A3A1A Any public street or road in an urban area

1A4A2A1 DRIV_aDVM_RADIO_1_1A4A2A1 - In the last working week, did you service/repair/replace brakes or clutches on vehicles older than [DE: 2005, FI: 1993; FR: 1997; IE: 2000; ES: 2002 ; HU:  2005]?
1A4A4 DRIV_aDVM_RADIO_1_1A4A4 - In the last working week, did you drain fuel tanks or change fuel filters?
1A4A5 DRIV_aDVM_CHECK_1_1A4A5 - In the last working week, did you work indoors or outdoors?
1A4A5A1 DRIV_aDVM_CHECK_1_1A4A5A1 - How was the area where you carried out vehicle maintenance ventilated?

categories.catLabel: aDVM_1A4A5A1A By local exhaust ventilation which captured the vapour, dust, fume at the emission point
aDVM_1A4A5A1B By on-tool extraction to remove dust and fumes away from your face
aDVM_1A4A5A1C By a general ventilation system

aDVM_1A4A5A1E By open doors or windows
aDVM_1A4A5A1F No ventilation was applied to the area

qlabel: 1 DRIV_aMAH_RADIO_2_1 - In the last working week, did you load and/or unload vehicles yourself?
1A1 DRIV_aMAH_CHECK_2_1A1 - What materials or goods did you load or unload in the last working week?

categories.catLabel: aMAH_1A1C Materials containing hardwood such as wood chips, pellets
aMAH_1A1E Ores, such as coal, bauxite, iron ore

qlabel: 1A1A1 DRIV_aMAH_RADIO_2_1A1A1 - Were the asbestos-containing products you loaded or unloaded wrapped (double bag, sealed)?

1A1A1B1B1 DRIV_aMAH_CHECK_2_1A1A1B1B1 - In what condition was the asbestos?

categories.catLabel: aMAH_1A1A1B1B1A Good (where you could see loose fibres and dust)
aMAH_1A1A1B1B1B Poor (where release of fibres is likely)

qlabel: 1A1A1B2 DRIV_aMAH_RADIO_2_1A1A1B2 - In the last working week, did you wear respiratory protection when you loaded/unloaded asbestos-containing products?
1A1A1B2A1 DRIV_aMAH_CHECK_2_1A1A1B2A1 - What types of respiratory protective equipment (RPE) did you use?

categories.catLabel: aMAH_1A1A1B2A1A Rubber face mask fitted with a particle/vapour filter or a cartridge
aMAH_1A1A1B2A1C Air-supplied respirator or SCBA (self-contained breathing apparatus)
aMAH_1A1A1B2A1D A filtering face piece mask or dust mask (called an FFP)

1A1E1 DRIV_aMAH_RADIO_2_1A1E1 - Please specify the type of ore
1A2 DRIV_aMAH_CHECK_2_1A2 - How was the loading and/or unloading done?

categories.catLabel: aMAH_1A2A Hand, handcart or handtruck, or other mechanical devices
